definition: abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
Vatican City, capital of Holy See

sentences.english: He will also visit the Vatican before leaving for Ghana.
sentences.chinese: 他還將訪問梵蒂岡，隨後將前往加納訪問。

sentences.english: Beijing severed ties with the Vatican in 1951.
sentences.chinese: 中國於1951年和梵蒂岡斷交。

sentences.english: The Vatican was compelled, to establish an independent country, within the boundary of Italy.
sentences.chinese: 教廷被迫在梵蒂岡成爲意大利境內的一個獨立國家。

sentences.english: The Pope in the Vatican would never agree to this, but nothing can be done about it.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡的教宗是不贊成這樣的，但也沒辦法。

sentences.english: It is the second-smallest country in the world (after the Vatican City).
sentences.chinese: 它僅次於梵蒂岡，是世界上面積第二小國。

sentences.english: The Vatican said it wanted the caption removed.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡說，它希望撤掉這段文字。

sentences.english: But say to the Vatican, is a face of admiration.
sentences.chinese: 不過一說到梵蒂岡，倒是一臉敬仰。

sentences.english: The Vatican opposes abortion and artificial contraception.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡反對墮胎和人工避孕。

sentences.english: The association hopes to improve relations with the Vatican, he said.
sentences.chinese: 愛國會希望改善同梵蒂岡的關係”。

sentences.english: The full name of the Vatican, "Vatican City State", was built in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡全稱“梵蒂岡城國”，建於1929年。

sentences.english: The full name of the Vatican, "Vatican City State", was built in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡全稱“梵蒂岡城國”，建於1929年。

sentences.english: The guide showed us a colossal statue of Jupiter , in the Vatican.
sentences.chinese: 在梵蒂岡，嚮導領我們參觀了一座朱庇特巨像。

sentences.english: The Catholic church has had a conference about astrobiology.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡天主教會舉行了一場有關太空生物學的會議。

sentences.english: Gays, the Vatican believes, bring their misfortunes upon themselves.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡認爲同性戀者身遭不測是咎由自取。

sentences.english: During the 15th century Maestro Martino was chef to the Patriarch of Aquileia at the Vatican.
sentences.chinese: 在15世紀大師馬蒂諾是廚師的主教阿奎在梵蒂岡。

sentences.english: And we went to visit the Vatican. It was humongous!

definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
Yekaterinburg (Russian city, also known as Ekaterinburg or Sverdlovsk)

pinyin: Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2
